entry.title: Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made - Chapter 53 Heeeeeya you lovely...
entry.content:
SmileyGuy KoC Translations

Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made - Chapter 53

Heeeeeya you lovely people, I apologize for the tardiness of this chapter, Our redrawer was having some problem with their computer, seems everything is back to normal now.

Hope you like the chapter!

...

As usual, inaccuracies here and there.

Enjoy the read!!

entry.title: Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made - Chapter 52 Hello there you lovely...
entry.content:
SmileyGuy KoC Translations

Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made - Chapter 52

Hello there you lovely people, Here I bring the latest chapter of our favorite manga.

Apologizes for the tardiness of the upload, got myself my first job ever so things have been kinda hectic (I need to organize myself better lol)

...

As usual, inaccuracies here and there.

Enjoy the read!

entry.title: Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made - Chapter 51 Heya there, you lovely...
entry.content:
SmileyGuy KoC Translations

Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made - Chapter 51

Heya there, you lovely people.

Almost 4 months, huh? Sure felt like a lot more.

...

Well, after a long break we come back with the manga we all love, hope you guys enjoy it.

As usual, inaccuracies here and there.

Enjoy the read!!

entry.title: Twitter short time! This is one way Erika could've handled...
entry.content:
SmileyGuy KoC Translations

Twitter short time!

This is one way Erika could've handled the situation LOL.

entry.title: Twitter short time, cause there are no raws to translate just...
entry.content:
SmileyGuy KoC Translations

Twitter short time, cause there are no raws to translate just yet.

Questions you may have:

-Where does this cronolically fit? ...
It was uploaded to the author's twitter after chapter 22 (chapter when Akira and Aoi played a card duel), it was probably an idea that the author didn't expand upon.

-Why did you upload this?
Cause you'll need it for context for the other twitter short that'll be uploading tomorrow(or maybe the day after tomorrow?). That one will have characters from the actual manga.

-Who are these two?
Only the author will ever know that, though if you like conspiracy theories, the guy looks a bit of what Akira would've looked like as a guy if there wasn't any transformation.

Okay, now that all possible quetions have been answered...

Enjoy the read! (And look forward to the next twitter short)

entry.title: Hello there, everyone. So far still no raws to translate for...
entry.content:
SmileyGuy KoC Translations

Hello there, everyone.

So far still no raws to translate for Chapter 51.

Hopefully this twitter short makes the wait a bit more bearable (I have no idea of its chronological period so let's assume it's before Erika went full on psychokiller mode)

entry.content:
SmileyGuy KoC Translations

Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made - Chapter 50.

Hello there, good people. Here I come bringing the newest chapter for all of you to read!

As usual, inaccuracies here and there.

...

Enjoy the read!

entry.title: Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made - Chapter 49. It took more than I...
entry.content:
SmileyGuy KoC Translations

Ore ga Watashi ni Naru made - Chapter 49.

It took more than I wanted to finish this chapter, but I hope it was worth it!

I'm sorry for the delay!!

...

As usual, innacuracies here and there.

Enjoy the read!

Next chapter has a huuuuge surprise, so look forward to it!

entry.title: Welcome Back to "Smileyguy Koc Translations" everyone!...
entry.content:
SmileyGuy KoC Translations

Welcome Back to "Smileyguy Koc Translations" everyone!
Last page was deleted by the platform unfortunately, I'll try to take some more precautions this time around to avoid the same outcome (at least I hope so).

Sharing the page would be much appreciated, but it's completely up to you.

...

Once again, welcome back!

entry.content: SmileyGuy KoC Translations оновлює свою основну світлину.
